<<<api>>>: PrintWriter.write
<<<code>>>: PrintWriter outFile = new PrintWriter (new FileWriter("bottleCap.txt", true));
outFile.println("Trial " + trialNumber + " took " + counter + " drinks.");
outFile.close();
<<<explanation>>>: The issue is that you are creating a new PrintWriter object for each trial and overwriting the file each time. To fix this, you can use the FileWriter constructor with the append parameter set to true, which will append the new content to the existing file instead of overwriting it.
